p:
Primary production substantially declined throughout the experiment in all treatments (Supplementary Figure S3A), although SOIL-EX treatment showed higher overall values compared to the non-tDOM treatments ( p = 0.008,
η p 2
= 0.21). On the other hand, Chl- a differed significantly among treatments ( p < 0.0001,
η p 2
= 0.67), being markably higher in tDOM treatments, especially in SOIL-EX (Supplementary Figure S3B). Both PP and Chl- a showed strong positive correlations with BP in non-tDOM treatments ( r = 0.65–0.85), with Chl- a also showing a significant correlation in SOIL-EX treatment ( r = 0.66, p = 0.003).
